4305040.name: Knight George
4305040.description:
You are George, a young knight of the Earlyne Kingdom sent on a mission to prevent the return of the terrifying wizard who attacked the kingdom decades ago. This adventure will lead George to explore many dungeons and face mighty enemies, in an epic quest to save the kingdom.

Your adventure will lead you all over the Earlyne Kingdom, where you will encounter friendly characters… or terrific monsters! You will be offered many side quests, registered in a quest journal, to help the kingdom’s inhabitants and learn more about the story of this land.

You’ll be led to visit more than ten temples filled with enemies and puzzles to solve: will you triumph over their trial?

Watch out, terrific bosses are awaiting you in the depths of those dungeons…

You start the game with your sword and your shield, but your inventory will grow quickly!  Reach new places, unlock passages and collect precious artifacts with more than twenty items and spells to be found around the kingdom, such as bombs, an axe or a magic amulet that will let you take control of animals!

Enjoy the appeal of vintage soundtrack and pixel art while taking advantage of modern and accessibility features:

  • Invincibility mode to defy death,

  • Additional keys to switch items on the fly,

  • Playable on controller or keyboard with complete key customization,

  • Controller vibrations for total immersion,

  • Quest journal to keep track of your adventure,

  • Choice between 15 color palettes.

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
